20110125233214.000|20110125233215.000|CC1|THAT SHE INTRODUCE HER SECRET   
20110125233215.000|20110125233215.000|CC1|SISTER TO THE WORLD AS A RATINGS
20110125233215.000|20110125233218.000|CC1|PLOY.

20110125233418.000|20110125233419.000|CC1|UNAWARE OF THE LIFE OR DEATH

20110125233421.000|20110125233425.000|CC1|INTO THE DEPTHS.

20110125233426.000|20110125233429.000|CC1|ALMOST DROWNING.

20110125233430.000|20110125233433.000|CC1|FRANCISCO CALLED MAVERICKS.     
20110125233433.000|20110125233434.000|CC1|15 SURFERS GO FOR THE WAVE.     
20110125233434.000|20110125233435.000|CC1|THE 25-FOOT MONSTER CATCHES SOME
20110125233435.000|20110125233435.000|CC1|OFF GUARD.

20110125233436.000|20110125233438.000|CC1|THIS.

20110125233443.000|20110125233444.000|CC1|GUYS WERE CAUGHT IN THE WAVE,   
20110125233444.000|20110125233445.000|CC1|CAUGHT IN THE LIP AND WENT 20   
20110125233445.000|20110125233448.000|CC1|FEET UNDER.                     
20110125233448.000|20110125233449.000|CC1|>> A SURFER VANISHES.           
20110125233449.000|20110125233449.000|CC1|WHEN THE SURF BOARD POPS UP,    
20110125233449.000|20110125233450.000|CC1|THERE IS NO SIGN OF JACOB.

20110125233504.000|20110125233504.000|CC1|HOSPITAL.                       
20110125233504.000|20110125233505.000|CC1|>> WE FOUND OUT HE IS TALKING   
20110125233505.000|20110125233510.000|CC1|AND OFF LIFE SUPPORT.           
20110125233510.000|20110125233510.000|CC1|SO, IT'S GREAT NEWS.            
20110125233510.000|20110125233511.000|CC1|WE ARE ECSTATIC.                
20110125233511.000|20110125233511.000|CC1|>> THIS ISN'T THE FIRST TIME    
20110125233511.000|20110125233514.000|CC1|THERE

20110125233515.000|20110125233518.000|CC1|THIS WAS A FRIGHTENING SCENE    
20110125233518.000|20110125233519.000|CC1|WHEN A MASSIVE WAVE OVERWHELMED 
20110125233519.000|20110125233520.000|CC1|SPECTATORS AT A SURFING         
20110125233520.000|20110125233523.000|CC1|COMPETITION LAST YEAR.          
20110125233523.000|20110125233525.000|CC1|THE SCENE WAS CHAOTIC.

20110125233538.000|20110125233539.000|CC1|>>> IT WAS AN UNTHINKABLE CASE, 
20110125233539.000|20110125233540.000|CC1|A WOMAN ACCUSING HER OWN HUSBAND
20110125233540.000|20110125233540.000|CC1|OF RAPING HER.                  
20110125233540.000|20110125233543.000|CC1|HE WAS CONVICTED OF SEXUAL      
20110125233543.000|20110125233544.000|CC1|ASSAULT AND FACES SENTENCING.   
20110125233544.000|20110125233545.000|CC1|AS HE DOES, HIS MOTHER IS       
20110125233545.000|20110125233546.000|CC1|SPEAKING OUT, PLEADING FOR MERCY
20110125233546.000|20110125233551.000|CC1|FOR HER SON.                    
20110125233551.000|20110125233554.000|CC1|PAUL BOYD WITH THE STORY THAT   
20110125233554.000|20110125233554.000|CC1|MAY BE UPSETTING FOR YOUNGER    
20110125233554.000|20110125233558.000|CC1|VIEWERS.                        
20110125233558.000|20110125233559.000|CC1|>> THIS IS NOT THE WAY THINGS   
20110125233559.000|20110125233601.000|CC1|WERE SUPPOSED TO BE FOR US.     
20110125233601.000|20110125233603.000|CC1|>> A WOMAN WHO SAYS SHE WAS     
20110125233603.000|20110125233604.000|CC1|RAPED BY HER OWN HUSBAND        
20110125233604.000|20110125233605.000|CC1|CONFRONTS HIM IN COURT.         
20110125233605.000|20110125233605.000|CC1|>> HE WAS THE ONE WE TRUSTED TO 
20110125233605.000|20110125233606.000|CC1|TAKE CARE OF US.                
20110125233606.000|20110125233606.000|CC1|HE BETRAYED US.                 
20110125233606.000|20110125233608.000|CC1|HE HUMILIATED ALL OF US.        
20110125233608.000|20110125233609.000|CC1|AND MY HEART STILL BREAKS WHEN I
20110125233609.000|20110125233610.000|CC1|THINK HOW THIS HAPPENED AND HOW 
20110125233610.000|20110125233615.000|CC1|OUR LIVES CAME CRASHING APART.  
20110125233615.000|20110125233618.000|CC1|>> IT HAPPENED AS 40-YEAR-OLD   
20110125233618.000|20110125233621.000|CC1|SEAN HARRIS                     
20110125233621.000|20110125233624.000|CC1|WAS SENTENCED FOR SEXUALLY      
20110125233624.000|20110125233625.000|CC1|ASSAULTING HIS WIFE IN THEIR    
20110125233625.000|20110125233628.000|CC1|BEDROOM AT THIS SAN DIEGO HOME. 
20110125233628.000|20110125233629.000|CC1|IN A DRAMATIC IMPACT STATEMENT, 
20110125233629.000|20110125233630.000|CC1|37-YEAR-OLD CRYSTAL HARRIS SAID 
20110125233630.000|20110125233630.000|CC1|SHE IS AFRAID HER NOW EX-       
20110125233630.000|20110125233631.000|CC1|HUSBAND WILL MURDER HER WHEN HE 
20110125233631.000|20110125233633.000|CC1|IS SET FREE.                    
20110125233633.000|20110125233634.000|CC1|>> I AM BEGGING YOU TO SAVE US  
20110125233634.000|20110125233635.000|CC1|ALL FROM HIM FOR AS LONG AS     
20110125233635.000|20110125233638.000|CC1|POSSIBLE.                       
20110125233638.000|20110125233639.000|CC1|>> ANOTHER WOMAN IN HARRIS'     
20110125233639.000|20110125233640.000|CC1|LIFE, HIS MOM, TOLD THE JUDGE   
20110125233640.000|20110125233640.000|CC1|SHE STILL BELIEVES HE IS        
20110125233640.000|20110125233643.000|CC1|INNOCENT.                       
20110125233643.000|20110125233644.000|CC1|>> MY SON HAS BEEN GONE FOR 2   
20110125233644.000|20110125233644.000|CC1|1/2 YEARS.                      
20110125233644.000|20110125233645.000|CC1|I BELIEVE HE IS TOTALLY         
20110125233645.000|20110125233650.000|CC1|INNOCENT.                       
20110125233650.000|20110125233651.000|CC1|>> HARRIS SAT IMPASSIVELY       
20110125233651.000|20110125233653.000|CC1|THROUGHOUT THE EMOTIONALLY      
20110125233653.000|20110125233655.000|CC1|CHARGED HEARING.                
20110125233655.000|20110125233658.000|CC1|>> I SINCERELY APOLOGIZE TO     
20110125233658.000|20110125233659.000|CC1|EVERYONE AFFECTED BY MY ACTIONS.
20110125233659.000|20110125233700.000|CC1|I DO NOT HARBOR ANY ILL-WILL TO 
20110125233700.000|20110125233705.000|CC1|MY FORMER SPOUSE.               
20110125233705.000|20110125233706.000|CC1|>> CRYSTAL HARRIS CAPTURED THE  
20110125233706.000|20110125233709.000|CC1|VIOLENT ASSAULT ON AUDIO TAPE.  
20110125233709.000|20110125233709.000|CC1|IT HAPPENED AS THEIR TWO        
20110125233709.000|20110125233710.000|CC1|CHILDREN SLEPT IN ANOTHER ROOM. 
20110125233710.000|20110125233711.000|CC1|SHE CAN BE HEARD SAYING NO 50
